name: That time i got locked in a MINIGAME Collection
name_original: That time i got locked in a MINIGAME Collection
description:
A fun minigame collection with an highscore system!

Sprite Work by Diogo Maia.

Programmed by Rodrigo Rosa.

Story:

"My name is Takesuke Gotou and, as you can see, I'm just your plain regular ass high school

student. So I went to buy the latest issue of Super Epic Saga Omega 3000,

however, the store had this huge arcade machine with very... peculiar art on 

the sides. My eyes couldn't help but become glued to it. 

As I was slowly approaching it, I felt some ominous force pulling me in and

somehow transfigured every ounce of my being into this video game.

If ya could help me acheive at least a decent highschore in this, that'd be

pretty cool, I guess. Maybe I could go back home this way, who knows?"
